title: Group portrait of Ministers' Wives of Allegheny-Union Baptist Association members, seated from left: Mrs. B. McMillan, Mrs. L. Bowick, Mrs. C. Jackson, Mrs. S. Morton, Mrs. W. D. Petett, Mrs. H. H. Gaines, Mrs. D. B. Russell, Mrs. M. L. Gordan, and Mrs. J. A. Williams; back row: Revs. J. J. Gaines, H. R. WIlliams, G. F. Nelson, J. F. McMillan, L. E. Dukes, and W. D. Petett, posed in Aged Ministers' and Laymen's Home to dedicate new television set
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
